name: Dezman Barton
coverLetter: I've haven't trimmed before but moved here from Florida in order to learn how to trim and be apart of the cannabis industry. I quickly adapt to learning new skills and play close attention to detail. I take pride in quality with efficiency. I may need a space to stay unless the job site is easily in a commutable location. Will be able to provide my own meals. I have open availability from early morning until late evening. Available to work asap.
